summary:
Business analyst / consultant with 11 years of international experience.
Worked with Tier 1 banks and an asset manager for various regulatory compliance, business intelligence, process re-engineering and digitalization projects.
Extensive experience in business analysis, functional testing, change management, stakeholder and vendor management with globally spread teams. 
Worked with both Agile (SAFe, Scrum, Kanban) and Waterfall models.
Track record of various successful deliveries.

school.name: West Bengal University of Technology, Kolkata

awards.title: Individual Achievement Award
awards.description: In recognition of significant contribution to the "Global Business Mapping Programme".

awards.title: Team Achievement Award
awards.description: In recognition of significant contribution to the "Global Business Mapping Programme".

certifications.name: Industrial Training on Microelectronics Technology & VLSI Design
Vocational Training on Network Switching, Cellular Communication, Optical Fibre Networks

projects.title: Regulatory Compliance
projects.description:
A. Working with a global investment bank as a functional analyst for implementation of regulatory reporting requirements for North American, European and APAC jurisdictions (CFTC/Canadian Provinces/ESMA/ASIC/MAS/HKMA).

B. Responsible for creating functional requirement documents, mock ups, coordination and query resolution of internal development and testing teams.

C. Working in close co-ordination with client on site at client location in London. Extensive interaction with stakeholders from client location all over the world including London, New York, Singapore, Australia and India.

projects.title: Global Business Mapping Program
projects.description:
A. Worked with a global investment bank as a functional analyst on behalf Capital Markets practice of Infosys Ltd.

B. Worked as process discovery analyst and performed end-to-end process mapping for business process re-engineering across products and geographies.

C. Exposed to the following business areas of the client for multiple jurisdictions -
 1. Cash Operations
 2. Client On Boarding
 3. Commodities Operations
 4. Clearing Services
 5. Trade Support

D. Responsible for delivery targets. Led local teams, coordinated with globally spread out teams and achieved targets ahead of time.

E. Extensive client interaction experience across India, USA and the UK.

profile_positions.description:
Business analyst in data warehouse catering to a broad spectrum of business needs across front office, risk, and operations.
Primary point of contact for regulatory compliance related solutions based on the data warehouse at APG AM.
Contributed to future architecture and process landscape of the company as part the internal architecture community.
profile_positions.title: Business Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Worked as a business analyst with the regulatory reporting team for MUFG Bank Europe, based in Amsterdam.
Using a data warehouse environment for finance and risk data, worked on AnaCredit reporting solution utilizing OneSumX from Wolters Kluwer. Liaised with business stakeholders, developers, testers and 3rd party vendor for successful delivery.
Also contributed towards new changes, maintenance required for IFRS9 solution.

Passively involved with Finrep, Corep and DGS reporting as well.
profile_positions.title: Business Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Worked as a senior business analyst, contributing to multiple projects - 

A. Client Accounting - Helped consolidate and migrate various local client accounting general ledger tools to a centralized ERP system used across the organization. Working as the lead business analyst, responsible for requirement gathering, user stories, epics, refinement, planning, vendor liaison etc. 
Also, helped with process optimization exercises at the Dutch office for Client Accounting.

B. KYC - Helped replace manual on-boarding procedures with a digital solution including automated identity verification. Responsible for User Journeys, epics, user stories, refinement, functional testing (behaviour driven development), stakeholder management etc.
profile_positions.title: Senior Business Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Worked as a consultant within the regulatory reporting team in ING for cross asset data reporting to different regulators. Regulations/Jurisdictions include - 
MiFID II, EMIR, MMSR, MAS, HKMA, BOE, EMMI and Canadian Provinces.

Directly engaged by business stakeholders for functional management, analysis/testing, end-to-end governance of operational processes including reconciliation and control frameworks. 
Worked in Biz-Dev-Ops mode for more Agile (Scrum, Kanban) deliveries and operational excellence.
profile_positions.title: Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Working as a Business Analyst/Functional Manager with ABN Amro to oversee regulatory reporting solutions for multiple jurisdictions e.g. EMIR/MMSR/Dodd-Frank/BoE etc. 

Extensively engaged with ABN's business, operations and change teams working in Agile Scrum mode.

Responsibilities include owning functional management of production environment for reporting solutions and to review and approve functionalities and architecture of future changes and road map.
profile_positions.title: Business Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Working as a Business Analyst/Functional Manager with business and operations teams of the third largest bank in Netherlands. 
Responsible for functional side of cross-asset trade reporting solution for global jurisdictions/regulations e.g. ESMA, MMSR, Dodd Frank, MAS etc.
profile_positions.title: Senior Associate Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Regulatory Compliance / Reporting –
i. Snapshot – This project involves reporting trade data to relevant trade repositories for multiple jurisdictions in APAC, North America and Europe.
ii. Roles & Responsibilities –
a. Working closely with a leading global investment banking / asset management client as a functional analyst for regulatory reporting, interacting directly with stakeholders at client location in London.
b. Acting as single point of contact for functional analysis of deliverables for multiple asset classes, primarily forex and rates for global jurisdictions including USA, Europe and APAC.
c. Acquired extensive experience in business requirement gathering, impact analysis, preparation of functional specification document, Dev/SIT/UAT/functional testing support and co-ordination between multiple teams spread across EU, North America & APAC.
Profile
d. Responsibilities include complete ownership of deliverables for specific line items for all jurisdictions along with relationship management. This involves engaging stakeholders of multiple teams from both client and vendors from project initiation to successful delivery. This engagement also has a flavour of project management with extensive interaction with global management of client, development, testing and other product & services vendor teams.
e. Key Learning –
 Different regulations e.g. Dodd-Frank, Canadian Provinces, EMIR, APAC and solution architecture.
 Co-ordination with multicultural teams including across APAC, USA & EU.
profile_positions.title: Associate Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Business Process Re-Engineering –
i. Snapshot – This project involved consultation and re-engineering of global business processes for multiple lines of business.
ii. Roles & Responsibilities –
a. Worked with a leading global investment banking / asset management client as a functional analyst for business process re-engineering program using suitable business process mapping (BPM) tools.
b. Led teams and achieved delivery targets for process mapping and optimization plans for specific lines of business. This involved engaging with internal and external stakeholders for analysis, resourcing, project planning as well.
c. Extensive interaction with client teams spread across USA, UK & India for business process elicitation, data analysis, consultation for risk and compliance requirements and operational efficiency.
d. Handled following business areas of the client for front to back process discovery, mapping, analysis and optimization –
 Commodities Operations
 Clearing Services
 Cash Operations
e. Key Learning –
 Process streamlining, optimization. Bottleneck, financial, regulatory and reputational risk identification. Business analysis and capital markets product specific certification.
 Rich experience in working with global cross-cultural teams, relationship management and project management skills.
profile_positions.title: Associate Business Analyst

profile_positions.description:
•	As-Is business process discovery, front-to-end process modelling using BPMN 2.0 standards for multiple tracks (Cash Operations, Commodities Operations) for a global investment bank.
•	Interactive sessions with subject matter experts of the client, located across three continents.
•	Team management with on time delivery.
profile_positions.title: Systems Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Underwent training program at Infosys campus in Mysore.
Trained in basic and intermediate elements of C and JAVA.
Extensive training on C++, UNIX, Perl, Oracle RDBMS and PL/SQL.
Business etiquette and business communication skills honed though training programs.
profile_positions.title: Systems Engineer Trainee

profile_positions.description:
Worked  with Deutsche Bank as a business analyst for cross-asset regulatory reporting solutions.

Roles & Responsibilities - 
A. Worked extensively on FX and Rates asset class specific reporting solutions.
B. Acted as SPOC for multiple functional deliverables.
C. Coordinated project milestones with bank's internal operations and change teams along with multiple vendors and external consultants.
D. Handled communications with trade data repositories
E. Extensive experience with multiple regulations e.g. EMIR/Dodd Frank Act/ASIC/MAS/HKMA etc.
profile_positions.title: Business Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Worked with Deutsche Bank as a business analyst of behalf on Infosys for global business mapping exercise.

Responsibilities -

•	Discovery analyst for Commodities UK/US, Inventory Trading, Trade Operations and Cash Operations US.
•	Engaged with subject matter experts from US, UK and India for business process elicitation.
•	Identification and documentation of business metrics used in analytics. 
•	Helped reduced process redundancy and bolster control mechanisms for different kinds of risks.
•	Worked with and led modelling teams, helping the team achieve delivery and quality targets.
•	Enhanced database queries for automated quality controls of process maps.
•	Interacted with business stake holders including VP, AVP, Associates and Project Managers for project related reporting and discussions.
profile_positions.title: Business Analyst
